::Demise/EndBringer/Scyther::

Demise snars as both him and Rampage roll off the side of the cliff, 
flying down toward the frozen river at the base of the mountain.

"I shall see you in the pit," he says to Rampage before they both hit 
down. Demise's claws sink into Rampage, the impact destroying almost 
every circuit in the lower half of Demise's body. The ice gives way, 
plunging the two bots into the ice-cold water below.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer's eyes widen as he sees the firepower coming at him. He 
fires severam missiles at it, managing to take out the missiles that 
Tankorr fired, and to set most of the bullets off course. He stumbles 
back as energy discharges and optic lasers hit him, his tentacles 
sparking. His armor was designed to reroute external energy to his 
tentacles, but this was more than he was used to.

His tentacles jerk uncontrollably, smoke rising out of his torso at 
the amount of energy running through him. One of the tentacles hits 
the ground, senidng electricity flowing through all the melted snow 
outward from EndBringer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther growls as Inferno bites him, spinning in the air to try and 
block Paralysis' shots with his attacker. He manages to block several 
of the shots, some of them hitting him in the back and sides. His 
charge launcher falls from his hand down to the ground below, the 
trigger stuck and the weapon madly firing charges.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Rampage growls, and also sees the cliff edge. It could be 
now, or 
> never. Rampage uses all his remaining strenght, and pushes Demise 
closer and 
> closer, all the while the injuries in his back leave a trail in the 
snow. 
> "Shall we go together?" He says, because with Demises claws dug 
into his 
> back, thier is no escape. So, with a final push, both bots tumble 
down the 
> cliff headed towrd the river of ice.
> 
>        Paralysis has no time to notice the water before he is 
knocked several 
> times from above. The left side of his face is no longer present, 
and his 
> innards are exposed.
>        Inferno rams into Scather, and sinks his fangs into the bot, 
chowing 
> down and holding him tight at the same time.
>        Paralysis, or what once was him, drew his pistol in the air 
and fired, 
> meanwile the mech drizzled down his chest, legs, and on to the 
snow. Now it 
> appeared if the battle was taking place on a giant dalmation.
> 
>        Tankkor was enraged beyond anything describable. Endgame was 
a 
> difficult opponent. Tankkor was now going to use a large sum of 
energy, but 
> it would be worth it.
>        Suddenly, Tannkors optic laser, missles, plasma discharges, 
and turret 
> bullets unleased in a spectical of light. All headed at Endgame.
